${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:MinecartRam.NAME: Minecart Ram
${modID}:MinecartRam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Use !${modID}:St! stone.

${modID}:EndCrystalExplosion.NAME: End Crystal Explosion
${modID}:EndCrystalExplosion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies AND yourself.

${modID}:Mine.NAME: Mine
${modID}:Mine.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mine !${modID}:St! Stone. NL ${modID}:Mine !${modID}:Ir! Iron. NL ${modID}:Mine !${modID}:Di! Diamond. Exhaust.

${modID}:PunchATree.NAME: Punch A Tree
${modID}:PunchATree.DESCRIPTION: Punch a tree for x wood. Exhaust.
${modID}:PunchATree.FLAVOR: Punching a tree... what could go wrong?

${modID}:QuarryMine.NAME: Quarry Mine
${modID}:QuarryMine.DESCRIPTION: Mine !M! Stone. Mine !M! Iron. Mine !M! Diamond. Exhaust.

${modID}:DigStraightDown.NAME: Dig Straight Down
${modID}:DigStraightDown.DESCRIPTION: Mine !${modID}:STONE! Stone. NL 50% Chance of Shuffling a Lava into your draw pile.

${modID}:MilkBucket.NAME: Milk Bucket
${modID}:MilkBucket.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL buffs and debuffs. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:WaterBucket.NAME: Water Bucket
${modID}:WaterBucket.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Gain !B! block. NL If Lava is drawn exhuast it and this Water Bucket and add an Obsidian Bâ€Žlock to your hand.

${modID}:Lava.NAME: Lava
${modID}:Lava.DESCRIPTION: At the start of the turn exhaust a random card from your hand. At end of turn deals !D! damage.

${modID}:BucketClutch.NAME: Bucket Clutch
${modID}:BucketClutch.DESCRIPTION: Use !${modID}:IRON! Iron. NL Gain !M! Intangible. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:BucketClutch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retains. Use !${modID}:IRON! Iron. NL Gain !M! Intangible. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:WoodenPickaxe.NAME: Wooden Pickaxe
${modID}:WoodenPickaxe.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL ${modID}:Equip this tool. NL ${modID}:Mine !${modID}:St! more stone. NL ${modID}:Mine !${modID}:Ir! more iron. NL ${modID}:Mine !${modID}:Di! more diamond. NL ${modID}:Durability left !${modID}:Dur!
${modID}:WoodenPickaxe.FLAVOR: Its a basic pickaxe... Like you... BASIC

${modID}:StonePickaxe.NAME: Stone Pickaxe
${modID}:StonePickaxe.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL ${modID}:Equip this tool. NL ${modID}:Mine !${modID}:St! more stone. NL ${modID}:Mine !${modID}:Ir! more iron. NL ${modID}:Mine !${modID}:Di! more diamond. NL ${modID}:Durability left !${modID}:Dur!

${modID}:WoodenAxe.NAME: Wooden Axe
${modID}:WoodenAxe.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL ${modID}:Equip this tool. NL ${modID}:Chop Wood. NL Every attack applies vulnerable and uses durability. NL ${modID}:Durability left !${modID}:Dur!
